content: the super simple stitch scarf is as named super easy to make it uses the tunisian simple stitch all through the pattern it s an easy pattern for everyone it s a great project if you want to tunisian crochet and have never tried it before it s very versitile in that you can easily make it as long or short as you want use a hook 2-3mm bigger then whats recommended for your yarn if it s too tight it can make your work twist some blocking will fix most twisting
